column3: '- what you have learned so far\r\nI\'ve learned to be proactive\r\nI\'ve learned to pay attention to research. If you look hard enough
column4:
you will find the answers.
I've learned to ask for help.

- what you wish to still learn
I really want to code. I'm a total newbie and I'm hoping that I will be able to access training for beginners like me

- what you wish should be improved.
I think the way information is disseminated can be improved. It wasn't really easy getting information on what to do first
column5: but I guess I\'ve learned from it'

column3: 'No matter what happens in  your journey
column4: make sure  not to succumb to circumstances.'

column3: 'I\'ve been having so much to do recently and the same 24 hours daily as I\'ve always had. Multi tasking hasn\'t really been my forte as I prefer to focus and compartmentalize. But at this stage in my life
column4: there is no room for excuses
column5: I have to evolve because the alternative is unthinkable.'

column4: there is no doubt about that. Yet
column5: it is a choice of which most people refuse to make. We all have the power to make of ourselves what we want. Choose life
